PONE-D-17-15841R2, DOI: 10.1371/journal.pone.0184397
Debora Ferreira Barreto-Vieira (BRAZIL): "Structural investigation of C6/36 and Vero cell cultures infected with a Brazilian Zika virus."
authors: Debora Ferreira Barreto-Vieira,Fernanda Cunha Jácome,Marcos Alexandre Nunes da Silva,Gabriela Cardoso Caldas,Elen Mello de Souza,Audrien Alves Andrade,Ortrud Monika Barth.

components.data: Wash previously fixed cells in sodium cacodylate buffer 0,2M in saccharose 7% for 5 minutes (3 times).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash previously fixed cells in sodium cacodylate buffer 0,2M in saccharose 7% for 5 minutes (3 times).

components.data: Postfix cells in osmium tetroxide 1% for 30 minutes.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Postfix cells in osmium tetroxide 1% for 30 minutes.

components.data: Wash cells in sodium cacodylate buffer 0,2M in saccharose 7% for 5 minutes (1 time) and in distilled water for 10 minutes (2 times).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash cells in sodium cacodylate buffer 0,2M in saccharose 7% for 5 minutes (1 time) and in distilled water for 10 minutes (2 times).

components.data: Dehydrate cells by immersing the material in graduated solutions of acetone as follows: acetone 15%, 30% and 50% (10 minutes each), acetone 70% in uranyl acetate 1% (30 minutes), acetone 90% (5 minutes) and acetone 100% in copper sulfate (2 times for 10 minutes).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dehydrate cells by immersing the material in graduated solutions of acetone as follows: acetone 15%, 30% and 50% (10 minutes each), acetone 70% in uranyl acetate 1% (30 minutes), acetone 90% (5 minutes) and acetone 100% in copper sulfate (2 times for 10 minutes).

components.data: Infiltrate cells by immersing the material in epoxi resin at a 1:3 ratio of acetone P.A. for 30 minutes and at 3:1 ratio of acetone P.A overnight.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Infiltrate cells by immersing the material in epoxi resin at a 1:3 ratio of acetone P.A. for 30 minutes and at 3:1 ratio of acetone P.A overnight.

components.data: Embed cells by adding epoxi resin to the eppendorfs containing the cells. Polymerization occurs at 60°C during three days.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Embed cells by adding epoxi resin to the eppendorfs containing the cells. Polymerization occurs at 60°C during three days.
